products.title: Sevilla Blackout Touchstone Grey  Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Grey really is the modern neutral, the go-anywhere and look great with anything shade, not to mention smart and crisp.  With this chic roller though theres just a hint of an earthy tone to the grey, adding a little warmth and a more homely feel.   Its a blackout fabric too, so

products.title: Sevilla Blackout Grey Roller Blind
products.metadescription:
This sevilla roller blind is light grey in colour and is very popular thanks to its understated city chic styling, which has a modern contemporary feel.

products.title: Sevilla Blackout Anchor Grey  Roller Blind
products.metadescription: This anchor grey roller blind is the height of fashion. It's a deep and dark grey tone that will blend beautifully with your furniture, decor and accessories.
